mapper.select: select * from v_msgaccount t1 where msgaccountid=#{id}

mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.ISLIST, t1.MAILADDRESS, t1.MOBILE, t1.MSGACCOUNTID, t1.MSGACCOUNTNAME, t1.MSGADDRESS, t1.MSNEMAIL, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WECHARADDR, t1.WXADDR FROM T_SRFMSGACCOUNT t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`ISLIST`, t1.`MAILADDRESS`, t1.`MOBILE`, t1.`MSGACCOUNTID`, t1.`MSGACCOUNTNAME`, t1.`MSGADDRESS`, t1.`MSNEMAIL`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WECHARADDR`, t1.`WXADDR` FROM `T_SRFMSGACCOUNT` t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.ISLIST, t1.MAILADDRESS, t1.MOBILE, t1.MSGACCOUNTID, t1.MSGACCOUNTNAME, t1.MSGADDRESS, t1.MSNEMAIL, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WECHARADDR, t1.WXADDR FROM T_SRFMSGACCOUNT t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
